content.rendered:
Hey everyone! Recently, one of the artists who is working with me to make the box of the game finished drawing the cover of the box. I’ve put a sample of the image below. This sample is really not doing justice to the original, and it won’t actually look like this in the final version. That’s because I’ve significantly lowered the quality and put in a watermark to help protect the artwork until the game is ready to be released. You can find some of the artist’s other works here: https://frnvch.tumblr.com/

What do you think of the art? Let me know in the comments below! Thanks for reading, and make sure to subscribe if you enjoy this content!

jetpack-related-posts.title: So, you want to launch a board game on Kickstarter? Read this first. (2019)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Sorry for my one month hiatus from writing blog posts- during this time I have been managing the campaign for Daggers Highschool. Anyway, Kickstarter is what I want to talk about in this blog post. There's already a wealth of information on this topic online, and so for…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Rulebook Review: The Institute for Magical Arts
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! While this post shares the same title as my previous series also called "Rulebook Reviews," it is different in a major way: this game has been published and available to purchase. In fact, I have decided to rename my previous series to "Rulebook Previews" as they are mostly…

jetpack-related-posts.title: My Favourite Board Game
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Every game designer has a favourite board game, so I thought I'd talk about mine today! Mine is Diplomacy, a game involving seven players trying to take control of Europe. Here is a map of the game: The rules are pretty simple, so I'll give a brief overview for those…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Villagers- Group Review
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Villagers was a very solid game that our group really enjoyed! We tried something new for this review by filming a portion of our game, which you can find here once it uploads: https://youtu.be/Iewv5AbgDgo. We plan to make many more videos of us playing games, so if you enjoy this…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Building an Audience
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Recently, I got a reminder to renew my website domain registration. That means that I have been working on building an audience for about a year now, and so today I thought I'd do an analysis of what has worked for me, and what has not. I will rate the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Massive update
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Lot's of stuff has been happening recently, and so I thought I'd fill everyone in on what's going on! Firstly some playtest photos:   Yep, that's right- a new teacher board! In addition, the card art is now 100% complete, colored, upscaled, and at acceptable resolution. One of…
